features: Built-in Speaker, PictBridge Support, face-priority AF function, in-camera red-eye fix

screendetails: LCD display - TFT active matrix - 2.5" - colour
lightsensitivity: ISO 100, ISO 1600, ISO 200, ISO 2000, ISO 3200, ISO 3200 (5Mpix), ISO 400, ISO 64, ISO 800, ISO auto (64-800)

flashmodes: Auto Mode, Fill-in mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction, slow synchro
